summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of East 55th Street, from East 54th Street near the intersection of Ravenna Place, to 27th Avenue Northeast, and of 25th Avenue Northeast from East 55th Street as extended, to East 54th Street, as provided in Ordinance No. 46355 of the City of Seattle, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
